#### Conditional Programming

```{r if... else...}
age = 20

if(age>=18){
  print("Adult")
}else{
  print("Minor")
}

```

```{r ifelse}
age = 10

if (age>= 18){
  print("Adult")
}else if(age>=13){
  print("Adolescent")
}else if(age>=2){
  print("Child")
}else{
  print("Infant")
}

```


```{r zscore fuction}
zscore = function(vect = NA){
  m = mean(vect, na.rm = T)
  sd = sd(vect, na.rm = T)
  z = (vect - m)/sd
  return(z)
}
```

```{r}
x = c(101,90, NA, NA, 114, 87, 106, 98, 93)
z = zscore(vect = x)
```
